namespace.title: namespace
namespace.description: A property namespace; different namespaces do not interact or override each other

name.title: name
name.description: Unique property name within a namespace; names starting with ! are run when the property is removed

display_name.title: display_name
display_name.description: Optional display name of the NPC, necessary if regular text is used in dialog

quest_components.title: quest_components
quest_components.description: A list of actions with associated prerequisites

block_break.title: Block Break
block_break.description: Fired when a player breaks a block or an explosion destroys a block.

blocks.title: blocks
blocks.description: Block types that trigger this event.

command.title: command
command.description: Command to execute when this event fires. Will be run at the broken block, and as the player, entity, or block that broke the block.

block_interact.title: Block Interact
block_interact.description: Fired when a player left or right clicks a block.

blocks.title: blocks
blocks.description: Block types that trigger this event.

type.title: click type
type.description: Either LEFT_CLICK, RIGHT_CLICK, or not set for either click type.

command.title: command
command.description: Command to execute when this event fires. Will be run at the broken block, and as the player, entity, or block that broke the block.

remote_click.title: Remote Click
remote_click.description: Fired when a player left or right clicks while looking in the direction of a matching block, even if that block is out of player range. Both the player and the targeted block must be in a zone with this zone property.

blocks.title: blocks
blocks.description: Block types that trigger this event. Omit to apply to all block types.

type.title: click type
type.description: Either LEFT_CLICK, RIGHT_CLICK, or not set for either click type.

command.title: command
command.description: Command to execute when this event fires. Will be run at the broken block, and as the player, entity, or block that broke the block.

max_distance.title: max_distance
max_distance.description: Maximum distance to check for blocks.

ignore_transparent_blocks.title: ignore_transparent_blocks
ignore_transparent_blocks.description: Whether to ignore transparent blocks when looking for a targeted block.

min_ticks_between_clicks.title: min_ticks_between_clicks
min_ticks_between_clicks.description: Minimum delay in ticks between two clicks. Clicks happening faster than this value will not count. This prevents the occasional double clicks that Minecraft does, as well as accidental double clicks. Defaults to 1 if not set. The minimum value of 0 only prevents multiple clicks in the same tick.
